sn46:1.1.2_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, himavantaṁ pabbatarājānaṁ nissāya nāgā kāyaṁ vaḍḍhenti, balaṁ gāhenti;
sn46:1.1.3_0: te tattha kāyaṁ vaḍḍhetvā balaṁ gāhetvā kusobbhe otaranti,
sn46:1.1.3_5: te tattha mahantattaṁ vepullattaṁ āpajjanti kāyena;
sn46:1.1.4_2: bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto mahantattaṁ vepullattaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesu.
sn46:1.1.5_2: bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto mahantattaṁ vepullattaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesūti?
sn46:1.1.6_2: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ;
sn46:1.1.12_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:1.1.13_2: bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto mahantattaṁ vepullattaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesū”ti.
sn46:2.1.2_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṁ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṁ paṭicca tiṭṭhati, anāhāro no tiṭṭhati;
sn46:2.3.4_0: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
sn46:2.4.2_0: Atthi, bhikkhave, arati tandi vijambhitā bhattasammado cetaso ca līnattaṁ.
sn46:2.6.4_0: ayamāhāro anuppannāya vā vicikicchāya uppādāya, uppannāya vā vicikicchāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
sn46:2.7.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṁ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṁ paṭicca tiṭṭhati, anāhāro no tiṭṭhati;
sn46:2.8.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṁ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṁ paṭicca tiṭṭhati, anāhāro no tiṭṭhati;
sn46:2.16.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṁ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṁ paṭicca tiṭṭhati, anāhāro no tiṭṭhati;
sn46:3.1.1_2: bhikkhū sīlasampannā samādhisampannā ñāṇasampannā vimuttisampannā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā,
sn46:3.1.2_0: savanampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bahukāraṁ vadāmi;
sn46:3.1.3_0: upasaṅkamanampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bahukāraṁ vadāmi;
sn46:3.1.4_0: payirupāsanampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bahukāraṁ vadāmi;
sn46:3.1.5_0: anussatimpāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bahukāraṁ vadāmi;
sn46:3.1.6_0: anupabbajjampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bahukāraṁ vadāmi.
sn46:3.1.8_2: bhikkhūnaṁ dhammaṁ sutvā dvayena vūpakāsena vūpakaṭṭho viharati—kāyavūpakāsena ca cittavūpakāsena ca.
sn46:3.1.9_0: So tathā vūpakaṭṭho viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ anussarati anuvitakketi.
sn46:3.2.1_2: bhikkhu tathā vūpakaṭṭho viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ anussarati anuvitakketi,
sn46:3.2.1_3: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti;
sn46:3.2.3_0: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
sn46:3.2.4_0: So tathā sato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicarati parivīmaṁsamāpajjati.
sn46:3.3.1_2: bhikkhu tathā sato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicarati parivīmaṁsamāpajjati,
sn46:3.3.1_3: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti;
sn46:3.3.3_0: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
sn46:3.3.4_0: Tassa taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicarato parivīmaṁsamāpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ.
sn46:3.4.1_2: bhikkhuno taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicarato parivīmaṁsamāpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ,
sn46:3.4.1_3: vīriyasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti;
sn46:3.4.1_5: vīriyasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
sn46:3.5.1_3: pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti;
sn46:3.5.1_5: pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
sn46:3.6.1_2: bhikkhuno pītimanassa kāyopi passambhati cittampi passambhati,
sn46:3.6.1_3: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti;
sn46:3.6.1_5: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
sn46:3.7.1_3: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti;
sn46:3.7.1_5: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
sn46:3.7.2_0: So tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
sn46:3.8.1_2: bhikkhu tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti,
sn46:3.8.1_3: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti;
sn46:3.8.1_5: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
sn46:3.9.1_2: sattasu sambojjhaṅgesu evaṁ bahulīkatesu satta phalā sattānisaṁsā pāṭikaṅkhā.
sn46:3.9.4_0: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṁ ārādheti, atha maraṇakāle aññaṁ ārādheti.
sn46:3.9.5_0: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṁ ārādheti,
sn46:3.9.5_2: atha pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti.
sn46:3.9.6_0: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṁ ārādheti,
sn46:3.9.6_2: no ce pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti,
sn46:3.9.6_3: atha pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā upahaccaparinibbāyī hoti.
sn46:3.9.7_0: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṁ ārādheti,
sn46:3.9.7_2: no ce pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti,
sn46:3.9.7_3: no ce pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā upahaccaparinibbāyī hoti,
sn46:3.9.7_4: atha pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.

sn46:3.9.8_2: no ce pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti,

sn46:3.9.8_5: atha pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
sn46:3.9.9_0: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṁ ārādheti,
sn46:3.9.9_2: no ce pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti,
sn46:3.9.9_3: no ce pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā upahaccaparinibbāyī hoti,

sn46:3.9.10_2: sattasu bojjhaṅgesu evaṁ bahulīkatesu ime satta phalā sattānisaṁsā pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
sn46:4.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā sāriputto sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn46:4.1.2_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn46:4.1.4_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
sn46:4.2.5_1: sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ,
sn46:4.2.6_0: yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi majjhanhikaṁ samayaṁ viharituṁ,
sn46:4.2.6_1: tena tena bojjhaṅgena majjhanhikaṁ samayaṁ viharāmi;
sn46:4.2.7_0: yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi sāyanhasamayaṁ viharituṁ,
sn46:4.2.8_0: Satisambojjhaṅgo iti ce me, āvuso, hoti,
sn46:4.2.9_0: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccayā me cavatī’ti pajānāmi …pe…
sn46:4.2.10_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo iti ce me, āvuso, hoti,
sn46:4.2.11_0: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccayā me cavatī’ti pajānāmi.
sn46:4.3.1_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā nānārattānaṁ dussānaṁ dussakaraṇḍako pūro assa.
sn46:4.3.2_0: So yaññadeva dussayugaṁ ākaṅkheyya pubbaṇhasamayaṁ pārupituṁ,
sn46:4.3.3_0: yaññadeva dussayugaṁ ākaṅkheyya majjhanhikaṁ samayaṁ pārupituṁ,
sn46:4.3.3_1: taṁ tadeva dussayugaṁ majjhanhikaṁ samayaṁ pārupeyya;
sn46:4.3.5_1: imesaṁ sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ,
sn46:4.3.6_0: yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi majjhanhikaṁ samayaṁ viharituṁ,
sn46:4.3.6_1: tena tena bojjhaṅgena majjhanhikaṁ samayaṁ viharāmi;
sn46:4.3.7_0: yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi sāyanhasamayaṁ viharituṁ,
sn46:4.3.8_0: Satisambojjhaṅgo iti ce me, āvuso, hoti,
sn46:4.3.9_0: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccayā me cavatī’ti pajānāmi …pe…
sn46:4.3.10_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo iti ce me, āvuso, hoti,
sn46:4.3.11_0: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccayā me cavatī’ti pajānāmī”ti.
sn46:5.1.2_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn46:5.1.2_1: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn46:5.1.6_1: satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ …pe…
sn46:5.1.7_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:5.1.8_0: Tassime satta bojjhaṅge bhāvayato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati,
sn46:5.1.10_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn46:6.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sākete viharati añjanavane migadāye.
sn46:6.1.2_0: Atha kho kuṇḍaliyo paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn46:6.1.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn46:6.1.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho kuṇḍaliyo paribbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn46:6.1.5_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bho gotama, pacchābhattaṁ bhuttapātarāsassa ayamācāro hoti—
sn46:6.1.6_0: ārāmena ārāmaṁ uyyānena uyyānaṁ anucaṅkamāmi anuvicarāmi.
sn46:6.1.7_0: So tattha passāmi eke samaṇabrāhmaṇe itivādappamokkhānisaṁsañceva kathaṁ kathente upārambhānisaṁsañca:
sn46:6.2.1_0: “Katame pana, bho gotama, dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrentī”ti?
sn46:6.2.2_0: “Satta kho, kuṇḍaliya, bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrentī”ti.
sn46:6.2.3_0: “Katame pana, bho gotama, dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”ti?
sn46:6.2.4_0: “Cattāro kho, kuṇḍaliya, satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”ti.
sn46:6.2.5_0: “Katame pana, bho gotama, dhammā bhāvitā, bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūrentī”ti?
sn46:6.2.6_0: “Tīṇi kho, kuṇḍaliya, sucaritāni bhāvitāni bahulīkatāni cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūrentī”ti.
sn46:6.2.7_0: “Katame pana, bho gotama, dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā tīṇi sucaritāni paripūrentī”ti?
sn46:6.2.8_0: “Indriyasaṁvaro kho, kuṇḍaliya, bhāvito bahulīkato tīṇi sucaritāni paripūretīti.
sn46:6.3.1_0: Kathaṁ bhāvito ca, kuṇḍaliya, indriyasaṁvaro kathaṁ bahulīkato tīṇi sucaritāni paripūretīti?
sn46:6.3.2_0: Idha, kuṇḍaliya, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā manāpaṁ nābhijjhati nābhihaṁsati, na rāgaṁ janeti.
sn46:6.3.3_0: Tassa ṭhito ca kāyo hoti, ṭhitaṁ cittaṁ ajjhattaṁ susaṇṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ.
sn46:6.3.4_0: Cakkhunā kho paneva rūpaṁ disvā amanāpaṁ na maṅku hoti appatiṭṭhitacitto adīnamānaso abyāpannacetaso.
sn46:6.3.5_0: Tassa ṭhito ca kāyo hoti ṭhitaṁ cittaṁ ajjhattaṁ susaṇṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ.
sn46:6.4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, kuṇḍaliya, bhikkhu sotena saddaṁ sutvā …pe…
sn46:6.4.5_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya manāpaṁ nābhijjhati nābhihaṁsati, na rāgaṁ janeti.
sn46:6.4.6_0: Tassa ṭhito ca kāyo hoti, ṭhitaṁ cittaṁ ajjhattaṁ susaṇṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ.
sn46:6.4.7_0: Manasā kho paneva dhammaṁ viññāya amanāpaṁ na maṅku hoti appatiṭṭhitacitto adīnamānaso abyāpannacetaso.
sn46:6.4.8_0: Tassa ṭhito ca kāyo hoti, ṭhitaṁ cittaṁ ajjhattaṁ susaṇṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ.
sn46:6.5.1_2: bhikkhuno cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā manāpāmanāpesu rūpesu ṭhito ca kāyo hoti,
sn46:6.5.6_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya manāpāmanāpesu dhammesu ṭhito ca kāyo hoti,
sn46:6.5.7_0: Evaṁ bhāvito kho, kuṇḍaliya, indriyasaṁvaro evaṁ bahulīkato tīṇi sucaritāni paripūreti.
sn46:6.6.1_2: tīṇi sucaritāni kathaṁ bahulīkatāni cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūrenti?
sn46:6.6.3_0: Evaṁ bhāvitāni kho, kuṇḍaliya, tīṇi sucaritāni evaṁ bahulīkatāni cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūrenti.
sn46:6.7.1_0: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, kuṇḍaliya, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā kathaṁ bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti?
sn46:6.7.2_2: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā,
sn46:6.7.5_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn46:6.7.6_0: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, kuṇḍaliya, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā evaṁ bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti.
sn46:6.8.1_0: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, kuṇḍaliya, satta bojjhaṅgā kathaṁ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrenti?
sn46:6.8.2_2: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ …pe…
sn46:6.8.3_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:6.8.4_0: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, kuṇḍaliya, satta bojjhaṅgā evaṁ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrentī”ti.
sn46:6.9.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, kuṇḍaliyo paribbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn46:6.9.3_7: evameva bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
sn46:6.9.4_0: Esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn46:6.9.5_0: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
sn46:7.1.1_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kūṭāgārassa yā kāci gopānasiyo, sabbā tā kūṭaninnā kūṭapoṇā kūṭapabbhārā;
sn46:7.1.2_2: bhikkhu satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro.
sn46:7.2.1_2: bhikkhu satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro?
sn46:7.2.2_2: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ …pe…
sn46:7.2.3_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:7.2.4_2: bhikkhu satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento satta bojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro”ti.
sn46:8.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ca upavāno āyasmā ca sāriputto kosambiyaṁ viharanti ghositārāme.

sn46:14.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn46:14.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahākassapo pippaliguhāyaṁ viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.

sn46:14.3.1_1: bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattanti.

sn46:14.4.2_0: Attamano āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandi.
sn46:14.4.4_0: Tathāpahīno cāyasmato mahākassapassa so ābādho ahosīti.

sn46:20.1.4_2: satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
sn46:21.1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn46:21.1.1_1: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn46:21.2.3_0: “‘Bodhāya saṁvattantī’ti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā bojjhaṅgāti vuccanti.
sn46:21.2.5_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:23.1.1_2: dhammānaṁ manasikārabahulīkārā anuppanno ceva kāmacchando uppajjati,
sn46:23.1.1_3: uppanno ca kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattati.
sn46:23.1.2_2: dhammānaṁ manasikārabahulīkārā anuppanno ceva byāpādo uppajjati,
sn46:23.1.2_3: uppanno ca byāpādo bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattati.
sn46:23.1.5_2: dhammānaṁ manasikārabahulīkārā anuppannā ceva vicikicchā uppajjati,
sn46:23.1.5_3: uppannā ca vicikicchā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattati.
sn46:23.2.1_2: dhammānaṁ manasikārabahulīkārā anuppanno ceva satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati,
sn46:23.2.2_2: dhammānaṁ manasikārabahulīkārā anuppanno ceva upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo uppajjati,
sn46:24.1.1_3: uppanno ca kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattati;
sn46:24.1.2_0: anuppanno ceva byāpādo uppajjati, uppanno ca byāpādo bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattati;
sn46:24.1.3_0: anuppannañceva thinamiddhaṁ uppajjati, uppannañca thinamiddhaṁ bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattati;
sn46:24.1.5_0: anuppannā ceva vicikicchā uppajjati, uppannā ca vicikicchā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattati;
sn46:24.2.2_0: anuppanno ceva byāpādo nuppajjati, uppanno ca byāpādo pahīyati;
sn46:24.2.3_0: anuppannañceva thinamiddhaṁ nuppajjati, uppannañca thinamiddhaṁ pahīyati;
sn46:24.2.4_0: anuppannañceva uddhaccakukkuccaṁ nuppajjati, uppannañca uddhaccakukkuccaṁ pahīyati;
sn46:24.2.5_0: anuppannā ceva vicikicchā nuppajjati, uppannā ca vicikicchā pahīyati.
sn46:25.1.3_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, satta aparihāniyā dhammā?
sn46:25.1.8_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, satta aparihāniyā dhammā”ti.
sn46:26.1.1_0: “Yo, bhikkhave, maggo yā paṭipadā taṇhakkhayāya saṁvattati, taṁ maggaṁ taṁ paṭipadaṁ bhāvetha.
sn46:26.1.2_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo katamā ca paṭipadā taṇhakkhayāya saṁvattati?
sn46:26.1.7_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā udāyī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn46:26.1.8_0: “kathaṁ bhāvitā nu kho, bhante, satta bojjhaṅgā, kathaṁ bahulīkatā taṇhakkhayāya saṁvattantī”ti?
sn46:26.2.1_1: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ vipulaṁ mahaggataṁ appamāṇaṁ abyāpajjaṁ.
sn46:26.2.2_0: Tassa satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāvayato vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ vipulaṁ
sn46:26.2.5_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ vipulaṁ mahaggataṁ appamāṇaṁ abyāpajjaṁ.
sn46:26.2.6_0: Tassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāvayato vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ
sn46:26.2.6_1: vipulaṁ mahaggataṁ appamāṇaṁ abyāpajjaṁ taṇhā pahīyati
sn46:26.2.9_0: Iti kho, udāyi, taṇhakkhayā kammakkhayo, kammakkhayā dukkhakkhayo”ti.
sn46:27.1.1_0: “Yo, bhikkhave, maggo yā paṭipadā taṇhānirodhāya saṁvattati, taṁ maggaṁ taṁ paṭipadaṁ bhāvetha.
sn46:27.1.2_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo katamā ca paṭipadā taṇhānirodhāya saṁvattati?
sn46:27.1.7_0: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, satta bojjhaṅgā kathaṁ bahulīkatā taṇhānirodhāya saṁvattanti?
sn46:27.2.1_2: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ …pe…
sn46:27.2.2_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:27.2.3_0: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhaṅgā evaṁ bahulīkatā taṇhānirodhāya saṁvattantī”ti.
sn46:28.1.8_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā udāyī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn46:28.1.9_0: “kathaṁ bhāvitā nu kho, bhante, satta bojjhaṅgā kathaṁ bahulīkatā nibbedhāya saṁvattantī”ti?
sn46:28.2.1_1: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ vipulaṁ mahaggataṁ appamāṇaṁ abyāpajjaṁ.
sn46:28.2.2_0: So satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāvitena cittena anibbiddhapubbaṁ appadālitapubbaṁ lobhakkhandhaṁ nibbijjhati padāleti;
sn46:28.2.5_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ vipulaṁ mahaggataṁ appamāṇaṁ abyāpajjaṁ.
sn46:28.2.6_0: So upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāvitena cittena anibbiddhapubbaṁ appadālitapubbaṁ lobhakkhandhaṁ nibbijjhati padāleti;
sn46:28.2.9_0: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, udāyi, satta bojjhaṅgā evaṁ bahulīkatā nibbedhāya saṁvattantī”ti.
sn46:29.1.1_3: yo evaṁ bhāvito bahulīkato saṁyojanīyānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya saṁvattati,

sn46:29.2.3_2: satta bojjhaṅgā evaṁ bahulīkatā saṁyojanīyānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya saṁvattanti.
sn46:30.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sumbhesu viharati setakaṁ nāma sumbhānaṁ nigamo.
sn46:30.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn46:30.1.2_1: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā udāyī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn46:30.2.2_0: Yāva bahukatañca me, bhante, bhagavati pemañca gāravo ca hirī ca ottappañca.
sn46:30.2.3_0: Ahañhi, bhante, pubbe agārikabhūto samāno abahukato ahosiṁ dhammena abahukato saṅghena.
sn46:30.2.4_0: So khvāhaṁ bhagavati pemañca gāravañca hiriñca ottappañca sampassamāno agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
sn46:30.2.6_0: ‘iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
sn46:30.2.10_0: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
sn46:30.3.1_1: suññāgāragato imesaṁ pañcupādānakkhandhānaṁ ukkujjāvakujjaṁ samparivattento ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ,
sn46:30.3.2_0: Dhammo ca me, bhante, abhisamito, maggo ca me paṭiladdho;

sn46:30.3.4_0: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānissāmi.

sn46:52.1.1_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pavisiṁsu.

sn46:52.2.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te bhikkhū aññatitthiyā paribbājakā etadavocuṁ:
sn46:52.3.1_0: “Samaṇo, āvuso, gotamo sāvakānaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ deseti:
sn46:52.3.2_2: pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṁ bhāvethā’ti.
sn46:52.3.3_0: Mayampi kho, āvuso, sāvakānaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ desema:
sn46:52.3.4_1: pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṁ bhāvethā’ti.
sn46:52.3.5_3: kiṁ nānākaraṇaṁ samaṇassa vā gotamassa amhākaṁ vā,
sn46:52.4.1_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ bhāsitaṁ neva abhinandiṁsu nappaṭikkosiṁsu;

sn46:52.4.4_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn46:52.5.1_0: “Idha mayaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pavisimha.
sn46:52.5.4_0: yannūna mayaṁ yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkameyyāmā’ti.
sn46:52.5.5_2: upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṁ sammodimha.
sn46:52.5.6_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdimha.
sn46:52.6.1_1: gotamo sāvakānaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ deseti “etha tumhe,
sn46:52.6.1_3: pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṁ bhāvethā”ti.
sn46:52.6.2_0: Mayampi kho, āvuso, sāvakānaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ desema:
sn46:52.6.3_1: pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṁ bhāvethā”ti.
sn46:52.6.4_3: kiṁ nānākaraṇaṁ samaṇassa vā gotamassa amhākaṁ vā,

sn46:52.8.6_2: passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya,
sn46:52.8.6_3: yo imesaṁ pañhānaṁ veyyākaraṇena cittaṁ ārādheyya,
sn46:52.8.6_4: aññatra tathāgatena vā tathāgatasāvakena vā ito vā pana sutvā.
sn46:52.9.1_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, pariyāyo, yaṁ pariyāyaṁ āgamma pañca nīvaraṇā dasa honti?
sn46:52.9.3_0: ‘Kāmacchandanīvaraṇan’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46:52.9.4_0: Yadapi, bhikkhave, ajjhattaṁ byāpādo tadapi nīvaraṇaṁ, yadapi bahiddhā byāpādo tadapi nīvaraṇaṁ.
sn46:52.9.5_0: ‘Byāpādanīvaraṇan’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46:52.9.6_0: Yadapi, bhikkhave, thinaṁ tadapi nīvaraṇaṁ, yadapi middhaṁ tadapi nīvaraṇaṁ.
sn46:52.9.7_0: ‘Thinamiddhanīvaraṇan’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46:52.9.8_0: Yadapi, bhikkhave, uddhaccaṁ tadapi nīvaraṇaṁ, yadapi kukkuccaṁ tadapi nīvaraṇaṁ.
sn46:52.9.9_0: ‘Uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇan’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46:52.9.10_3: yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu vicikicchā tadapi nīvaraṇaṁ.
sn46:52.9.11_0: ‘Vicikicchānīvaraṇan’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46:52.9.12_0: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pariyāyo, yaṁ pariyāyaṁ āgamma pañca nīvaraṇā dasa honti.
sn46:52.10.1_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, pariyāyo, yaṁ pariyāyaṁ āgamma satta bojjhaṅgā catuddasa honti?
sn46:52.10.2_3: yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjhaṅgo.
sn46:52.10.3_0: ‘Satisambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46:52.11.1_2: ajjhattaṁ dhammesu paññāya pavicinati pavicarati parivīmaṁsamāpajjati tadapi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo,
sn46:52.11.1_3: yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu paññāya pavicinati pavicarati parivīmaṁsamāpajjati tadapi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo.
sn46:52.11.2_0: ‘Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46:52.12.2_0: ‘Vīriyasambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46:52.13.2_0: ‘Pītisambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46:52.14.2_0: ‘Passaddhisambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46:52.15.2_0: ‘Samādhisambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46:52.16.1_3: yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā tadapi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
sn46:52.16.2_0: ‘Upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46:52.16.3_0: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pariyāyo, yaṁ pariyāyaṁ āgamma satta bojjhaṅgā catuddasā”ti.
sn46:53.1.1_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pavisiṁsu.
sn46:53.2.2_2: katamesaṁ tasmiṁ samaye bojjhaṅgānaṁ akālo bhāvanāya,
sn46:53.2.2_3: katamesaṁ tasmiṁ samaye bojjhaṅgānaṁ kālo bhāvanāya?
sn46:53.2.3_2: katamesaṁ tasmiṁ samaye bojjhaṅgānaṁ akālo bhāvanāya,
sn46:53.2.3_3: katamesaṁ tasmiṁ samaye bojjhaṅgānaṁ kālo bhāvanāyā’ti?
sn46:53.3.1_2: passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya yo imesaṁ pañhānaṁ veyyākaraṇena cittaṁ ārādheyya,
sn46:53.3.1_3: aññatra tathāgatena vā tathāgatasāvakena vā ito vā pana sutvā.
sn46:53.4.3_0: Līnaṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ taṁ etehi dhammehi dussamuṭṭhāpayaṁ hoti.
sn46:53.5.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṁ aggiṁ ujjāletukāmo assa.
sn46:53.5.2_0: So tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
sn46:53.5.3_0: bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṁ aggiṁ ujjāletun”ti?
sn46:53.6.3_0: Līnaṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ taṁ etehi dhammehi dussamuṭṭhāpayaṁ hoti.
sn46:53.7.3_0: Līnaṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ taṁ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṁ hoti.
sn46:53.8.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṁ aggiṁ ujjāletukāmo assa.
sn46:53.8.2_0: So tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
sn46:53.8.3_0: bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṁ aggiṁ ujjāletun”ti?
sn46:53.9.3_0: Līnaṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ taṁ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṁ hoti.
sn46:53.10.3_0: Uddhataṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ taṁ etehi dhammehi duvūpasamayaṁ hoti.
sn46:53.11.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṁ aggikkhandhaṁ nibbāpetukāmo assa.
sn46:53.11.2_0: So tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
sn46:53.11.3_0: bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṁ aggikkhandhaṁ nibbāpetun”ti?
sn46:53.12.3_0: Uddhataṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ taṁ etehi dhammehi duvūpasamayaṁ hoti.
sn46:53.13.3_0: Uddhataṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ taṁ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamayaṁ hoti.
sn46:53.14.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṁ aggikkhandhaṁ nibbāpetukāmo assa.
sn46:53.14.2_0: So tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
sn46:53.14.3_0: bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṁ aggikkhandhaṁ nibbāpetun”ti?
sn46:53.15.3_0: Uddhataṁ, bhikkhave, cittaṁ taṁ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamayaṁ hoti.
sn46:54.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā koliyesu viharati haliddavasanaṁ nāma koliyānaṁ nigamo.
sn46:54.1.2_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya haliddavasanaṁ piṇḍāya pavisiṁsu.
sn46:54.1.5_0: Yannūna mayaṁ yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkameyyāmā”ti.
sn46:54.2.1_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn46:54.2.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu.
sn46:54.2.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
sn46:54.2.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te bhikkhū aññatitthiyā paribbājakā etadavocuṁ:
sn46:54.3.1_0: “Samaṇo, āvuso, gotamo sāvakānaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ deseti:
sn46:54.3.2_2: pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha,
sn46:54.3.2_6: iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
sn46:54.3.3_0: Karuṇāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha,
sn46:54.3.3_4: iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ karuṇāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
sn46:54.3.4_0: Muditāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha,
sn46:54.3.4_4: iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ muditāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
sn46:54.3.5_0: Upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha,
sn46:54.3.5_4: iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
sn46:54.4.1_0: Mayampi kho, āvuso, sāvakānaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ desema:
sn46:54.4.2_1: pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha …pe…
sn46:54.4.5_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha,
sn46:54.4.6_0: iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
sn46:54.4.7_3: kiṁ nānākaraṇaṁ samaṇassa vā gotamassa amhākaṁ vā,
sn46:54.5.1_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ bhāsitaṁ neva abhinandiṁsu nappaṭikkosiṁsu.
sn46:54.5.4_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū haliddavasane piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn46:54.5.4_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn46:54.6.1_0: “Idha mayaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya haliddavasane piṇḍāya pavisimha.
sn46:54.7.1_0: Yannūna mayaṁ yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkameyyāmā’ti.
sn46:54.7.1_3: upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṁ sammodimha.
sn46:54.7.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdimha.
sn46:54.8.1_0: ‘Samaṇo, āvuso, gotamo sāvakānaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ deseti:
sn46:54.8.2_2: pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha …pe…
sn46:54.8.5_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha,
sn46:54.8.5_4: iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
sn46:54.9.1_0: Mayampi kho, āvuso, sāvakānaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ desema:
sn46:54.9.2_1: pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha …pe…
sn46:54.9.5_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharatha,
sn46:54.9.5_4: iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
sn46:54.9.6_3: kiṁ nānākaraṇaṁ samaṇassa vā gotamassa amhākaṁ vā, yadidaṁ,
sn46:54.10.1_1: tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ bhāsitaṁ neva abhinandimha nappaṭikkosimha,
sn46:54.11.2_0: ‘kathaṁ bhāvitā panāvuso, mettācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā?
sn46:54.11.3_0: Kathaṁ bhāvitā panāvuso, karuṇācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā?
sn46:54.11.4_0: Kathaṁ bhāvitā panāvuso, muditācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā?
sn46:54.11.5_0: Kathaṁ bhāvitā panāvuso, upekkhācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā’ti?
sn46:54.11.9_2: passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya,
sn46:54.11.9_3: yo imesaṁ pañhānaṁ veyyākaraṇena cittaṁ ārādheyya,
sn46:54.11.9_4: aññatra tathāgatena vā tathāgatasāvakena vā ito vā pana sutvā.
sn46:54.12.1_0: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, mettācetovimutti, kiṅgatikā hoti, kiṁparamā, kiṁphalā, kiṁpariyosānā?
sn46:54.12.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mettāsahagataṁ satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …pe…
sn46:54.12.3_0: mettāsahagataṁ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:54.12.4_0: So sace ākaṅkhati ‘appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti, paṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati.
sn46:54.12.5_0: Sace ākaṅkhati ‘paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti, appaṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati.
sn46:54.12.6_0: Sace ākaṅkhati ‘appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti,
sn46:54.12.7_0: Sace ākaṅkhati ‘paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti,
sn46:54.12.8_0: Sace ākaṅkhati ‘appaṭikūlañca paṭikūlañca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyyaṁ sato sampajāno’ti,
sn46:54.12.8_1: upekkhako ca tattha viharati sato sampajāno,
sn46:54.12.8_2: subhaṁ vā kho pana vimokkhaṁ upasampajja viharati.
sn46:54.13.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu karuṇāsahagataṁ satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …pe…
sn46:54.13.3_0: karuṇāsahagataṁ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:54.13.4_0: So sace ākaṅkhati ‘appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti, paṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati …pe…
sn46:54.13.5_0: sace ākaṅkhati ‘appaṭikūlañca paṭikūlañca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyyaṁ sato sampajāno’ti,
sn46:54.13.6_0: Sabbaso vā pana rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto
sn46:54.14.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu muditāsahagataṁ satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …pe…
sn46:54.14.3_0: muditāsahagataṁ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:54.14.4_0: So sace ākaṅkhati ‘appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti, paṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati …pe…
sn46:54.14.5_0: sace ākaṅkhati ‘appaṭikūlañca paṭikūlañca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyyaṁ sato sampajāno’ti,
sn46:54.14.6_0: Sabbaso vā pana ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
sn46:54.15.2_0: upekkhāsahagataṁ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:54.15.3_0: So sace ākaṅkhati ‘appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti, paṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati.
sn46:54.15.4_0: Sace ākaṅkhati ‘paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti, appaṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati.
sn46:54.15.5_0: Sace ākaṅkhati ‘appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti,
sn46:54.15.6_0: Sace ākaṅkhati ‘paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan’ti,
sn46:54.15.7_0: Sace ākaṅkhati ‘appaṭikūlañca paṭikūlañca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyyaṁ sato sampajāno’ti,
sn46:54.15.8_0: Sabbaso vā pana viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
sn46:55.1.2_0: Atha kho saṅgāravo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn46:55.1.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn46:55.1.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho saṅgāravo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn46:55.2.1_2: ko paccayo yenekadā dīgharattaṁ sajjhāyakatāpi mantā nappaṭibhanti,
sn46:55.2.2_2: ko paccayo yenekadā dīgharattaṁ asajjhāyakatāpi mantā paṭibhanti,
sn46:55.3.1_2: uppannassa ca kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti,
sn46:55.3.1_3: attatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ na jānāti na passati,
sn46:55.3.1_4: paratthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ na jānāti na passati,
sn46:55.3.1_5: ubhayatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ na jānāti na passati;
sn46:55.4.1_0: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, udapatto saṁsaṭṭho lākhāya vā haliddiyā vā nīliyā vā mañjiṭṭhāya vā.
sn46:55.4.2_0: Tattha cakkhumā puriso sakaṁ mukhanimittaṁ paccavekkhamāno yathābhūtaṁ na jāneyya na passeyya.
sn46:55.4.3_1: yasmiṁ samaye kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati kāmarāgaparetena,
sn46:55.4.3_2: uppannassa ca kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti,
sn46:55.4.3_3: attatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ na jānāti na passati …pe…
sn46:55.4.3_5: ubhayatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ na jānāti na passati;
sn46:55.5.1_1: yasmiṁ samaye byāpādapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati byāpādaparetena,
sn46:55.5.1_2: uppannassa ca byāpādassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti,
sn46:55.5.1_3: attatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ na jānāti na passati,
sn46:55.5.1_5: ubhayatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ na jānāti na passati;
sn46:55.6.1_0: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, udapatto agginā santatto pakkuthito usmudakajāto.
sn46:55.6.2_0: Tattha cakkhumā puriso sakaṁ mukhanimittaṁ paccavekkhamāno yathābhūtaṁ na jāneyya na passeyya.

sn46:55.24.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, saṅgāravo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

sn46:56.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
sn46:56.1.3_0: Atha kho abhayo rājakumāro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn46:56.1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho abhayo rājakumāro bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn46:56.1.7_0: Natthi hetu, natthi paccayo ñāṇāya dassanāya.
sn46:56.1.10_0: “Atthi, rājakumāra, hetu, atthi paccayo aññāṇāya adassanāya.
sn46:56.1.12_0: Atthi, rājakumāra, hetu, atthi paccayo ñāṇāya dassanāya.
sn46:56.2.1_0: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu, katamo paccayo aññāṇāya adassanāya?
sn46:56.2.2_0: Kathaṁ sahetu, sappaccayo aññāṇaṁ adassanaṁ hotī”ti?
sn46:56.2.3_3: uppannassa ca kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ na jānāti na passati—
sn46:56.2.4_0: ayampi kho, rājakumāra, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo aññāṇāya adassanāya.
sn46:56.2.5_0: Evampi sahetu sappaccayo aññāṇaṁ adassanaṁ hoti.
sn46:56.3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, rājakumāra, yasmiṁ samaye byāpādapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati byāpādaparetena …pe…
sn46:56.3.4_1: uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ na jānāti na passati—
sn46:56.3.5_0: ayampi kho, rājakumāra, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo aññāṇāya adassanāya.
sn46:56.3.6_0: Evampi sahetu sappaccayo aññāṇaṁ adassanaṁ hotī”ti.
sn46:56.4.5_1: nīvaraṇena abhibhūto yathābhūtaṁ na jāneyya na passeyya,
sn46:56.5.1_0: Katamo pana, bhante, hetu, katamo paccayo ñāṇāya dassanāya?
sn46:56.5.2_0: Kathaṁ sahetu, sappaccayo ñāṇaṁ dassanaṁ hotī”ti?
sn46:56.5.3_2: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:56.5.4_0: So satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāvitena cittena yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati—
sn46:56.5.5_0: ayampi kho, rājakumāra, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo ñāṇāya dassanāya.
sn46:56.5.6_0: Evampi sahetu, sappaccayo ñāṇaṁ dassanaṁ hoti.
sn46:56.6.2_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:56.6.3_0: So upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāvitena cittena yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passati—
sn46:56.6.4_0: ayampi kho, rājakumāra, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo ñāṇāya dassanāya.
sn46:56.6.5_0: Evaṁ sahetu, sappaccayo ñāṇaṁ dassanaṁ hotī”ti.
sn46:57.1.2_0: “Aṭṭhikasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā.
sn46:57.1.3_0: Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, aṭṭhikasaññā kathaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā?
sn46:57.1.4_2: bhikkhu aṭṭhikasaññāsahagataṁ satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ …pe…
sn46:57.1.5_0: aṭṭhikasaññāsahagataṁ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:57.1.6_0: Evaṁ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhikasaññā evaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā”ti.
sn46:57.2.1_2: bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—diṭṭheva dhamme aññā,
sn46:57.2.2_2: aṭṭhikasaññāya kathaṁ bahulīkatāya dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—diṭṭheva dhamme aññā,
sn46:57.2.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aṭṭhikasaññāsahagataṁ satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …pe…
sn46:57.2.4_0: aṭṭhikasaññāsahagataṁ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:57.2.5_2: aṭṭhikasaññāya evaṁ bahulīkatāya dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—diṭṭheva dhamme aññā,
sn46:57.3.1_0: “Aṭṭhikasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahato atthāya saṁvattati.

sn46:57.3.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aṭṭhikasaññāsahagataṁ satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …pe…

sn46:76.2.2_0: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā.

sn46:76.2.4_0: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā?
sn46:76.2.5_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nirodhasaññāsahagataṁ satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti …pe…
sn46:76.2.6_0: nirodhasaññāsahagataṁ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn46:76.2.7_2: nirodhasaññāya evaṁ bahulīkatāya dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—
sn46:76.2.8_0: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitāti.
sn46:76.3.2_2: nirodhasaññā kathaṁ bahulīkatā mahato atthāya saṁvattati,

sn46:89-98.1.1_0: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā”ti vitthāretabbaṁ.
